body:
Also, I would expect some differences between OpenStudio and Energyplus for heating/cooling since OpenStudio does more detailed modelling of the HVAC system (even when the system is Ideal Air, it gives more specifications than the Write IDF component does).

I would expect the electric lighting to be the same if you are using the exact same lighting schedule for each.  Is this the case in your image?  Do you find that you still get different lighting when you use the DAYSIM csv schedule (now that it csv schedules are fixed for OpenStudio)?

-Chris
